body_html:
@allenlavoie Is there a way to get all uninitialized variables for a Checkpoint or Checkpointable? All those that did not get initialized by a restore.

There seems to be a "solution" for global variables https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44268206/how-to-get-the-list-of-uninitialized-variables-from-tf-report-uninitialized-vari
body_text:
@allenlavoie Is there a way to get all uninitialized variables for a Checkpoint or Checkpointable? All those that did not get initialized by a restore.
There seems to be a "solution" for global variables https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44268206/how-to-get-the-list-of-uninitialized-variables-from-tf-report-uninitialized-vari
body:
@allenlavoie Is there a way to get all uninitialized variables for a Checkpoint or Checkpointable? All those that did not get initialized by a restore.

There seems to be a "solution" for global variables https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44268206/how-to-get-the-list-of-uninitialized-variables-from-tf-report-uninitialized-vari
